title: Bon Clay is One Piece's Most Lovable Side Character, and Here's Why
author: CBR Staff
description: An analysis of why Bon Clay became one of the greatest fan-favorite characters in One Piece due to his loyalty, friendship with Luffy, and unwavering ideals. Discusses his sacrifices in both Alabasta and Impel Down arcs.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through Impel Down arc including Bon Clay's sacrifice

title: 10 Times Bon Clay Proved He Was Luffy's Best Friend In One Piece
author: CBR Staff
description: A list article examining the major moments that demonstrate Bon Clay's incredible friendship and loyalty to Luffy, including his ten-hour vigil during Luffy's treatment in episode 440.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through the Impel Down arc

title: One Piece: How Bon Clay Became One of the Series' Best Characters
author: GameRant Staff
description: An in-depth analysis of Bon Clay's character development, examining how he transformed from an antagonist to one of the most beloved characters through his acts of loyalty and sacrifice.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses Bon Clay's arc through Impel Down

title: 440-441 'Believe in Miracles! Bon Clay's Cries from the Heart' and 'Luffy's Back! Ivan-san Begins the Breakout Plan!!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed blog post reviewing episodes 440-441, discussing Ivankov's Horm-Horm Fruit abilities, the emotional impact of Bon Clay's vigil, and Luffy's miraculous recovery.

title: One Piece Episodes 440 & 441- Back to Back!!!
author: Sawako
description: A contemporary review written shortly after the episodes aired, discussing the emotional impact of Bon Clay's loyalty and Luffy's recovery.

title: One Piece with a Lime - One Piece Eps 440-442
author: One Piece with a Lime
description: Podcast episode covering episodes 440-442 of One Piece, discussing the Impel Down arc events.

title: LUFFY RECOVERS & IVANKOV KNOWS DRAGON!? - One Piece Episode 440 & 441 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Creator
description: Video reaction and review of episodes 440-441, focusing on Luffy's recovery and the reveals about Ivankov's connection to Dragon.

title: One Piece Episode 440-441 Uncut Reaction
author: MCTV Reacts
description: Uncut reaction to episodes 440-441 of One Piece.

title: One Piece Episode 440 Review Extended Cut
author: Galvanium TV
description: Extended cut review of episode 440 as part of a complete One Piece review series.

title: One Piece: 5 Ways Ivankov Was The Hero Of Impel Down (& 5 It Was Bon Clay)
author: CBR Staff
description: Comparative analysis of Ivankov and Bon Clay's contributions during the Impel Down arc, including Bon Clay's emotional support during Luffy's recovery.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for entire Impel Down arc
